title: Emani vEginthunE
sahitya:
Emani vEgintunE shrI rAma rAma



anupallavi



Emani vEgintu nentani sairintu nA muddu dEvuDu nanu bAsE

nayyayyo



caraNam 1



pAlinci lAlinci palumAru gaugilinci tElinci nanu paradEshi

sEya dOcenO



caraNam 2



 ADina muccaTa nAdantarangamu niNDa nIDu lEdani unti nindAka

sarivArilO



caraNam 3



eDabAyaka tyAgarAju nElu shrI harini tolli baDalika lArci nA

caibaTTinadi talacucu
